Class GUIPauseMenuWindow

java.lang.Object

guigame.gui.main.GUIPauseMenuWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class GUIPauseMenuWindow
extends javax.swing.JWindow
Window to show a GUIPauseMenu. Stops the game loop and blocks the game. TODO: Use
See Also:
GUIPauseMenu, PauseMenu, Serialized Form
